snippet: So-called hacker hostels have sprouted up in the Bay area -- places for aspiring tech entrepreneurs to live, dodging expensive Silicon Valley rent while swapping ideas with like-minded individuals. Sometimes, the ideas lead to start-ups.
abstract: So-called hacker hostels have sprouted up in the Bay area -- places for aspiring tech entrepreneurs to live, dodging expensive Silicon Valley rent while swapping ideas with like-minded individuals. Sometimes, the ideas lead to start-ups.
